name: Borders Explorer (Edinburgh-Tweedbank 1 day)
description:
BORDERS EXPLORER This is a bus ranger ticket in the Borders area of southern Scotland for one day which also includes a rail connection between Edinburgh Waverley, Galashiels and Tweedbank. It allows unlimited bus travel for one day in the borders area but you can only leave or board the train at either Galashiels or Tweedbank in order to board the connecting Borders Bus 
      services. Note that this is not a rail ranger ticket between Edinburgh and Tweedbank.
